attributes.title: Haggo
attributes.religion: Great Stallion'''Haggo''' is a recurring background character in the Season 1

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Haggo is another of Drogo's bloodriders. During the wedding of Daenerys and Drogo, Haggo gives them a large leather whip with a silver handle. When the three bloodriders attempt to stop the [[Mirri Maz Duur]]'s [[blood magic]] ritual to heal Drogo, Haggo is killed by [[Rakharo]] and Jhogo.

'''Haggo''' is a recurring background character in the [[Season 1|first season]]. He is played by an unidentified extra and debuts in the [[Winter is Coming (episode)|series premiere]]. Haggo is a [[bloodrider]] to [[Khal]] [[Drogo]].
